sentences.sContent: “This form of behavior — independence, locomotor capacity, parental care and development — could be similar to the life history of the theropod,” he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: “This form of behavior — independence, locomotor capacity, parental care and development — could be similar to the life history of the theropod,” he said.
sentences.sCn: “这种行为形式，不管是独立性、运动能力，还是亲代抚育和发育过程，都与兽脚类恐龙的生活史相似，”他说。

sentences.sContent: “This form of behavior — independence, locomotor capacity, parental care and development — could be similar to the life history of the theropod, ” he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: “This form of behavior — independence, locomotor capacity, parental care and development — could be similar to the life history of the theropod, ” he said.
sentences.sCn: 这种行为——独立、运动力、亲代抚育和成长——可能与兽脚亚目食肉恐龙的生命轨迹类似"，戴尔博士说。

words.tran: 火车头的；运动的；移动的
